songs.title: Choices (Yup) (Golden State Warriors Theme Song)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Nope, yup
Nope, yup
Nope, yup
Nope, yup

[Verse 1: E-40]
Did it happen in one day?(Nope)
Came a long way? (Yup)
Never know what kind of angle (Nope)
Crossover break your ankles (Yup)
Sloppy with the rock? (Nope)
Stephen Curry with the shot? (Yup)
Suckers? (Nope)
Splash Brothers? (Yup)
Ain't no stopping (Nope)
Klay Thompson (Yup)
Under pressure is he choking (Nope)
Do it big like Bogut (Yup)
Never let them tell us that we can't (Nope)
Go hard like Barnes in the paint (Yup)
Never ever slowing down the pace (Nope)
Shoot a 3 pointer in his face! (Yup)

[Hook]
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)

These haters is hating they already know
But we never going to choke (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)
And I ain't gotta sell my soul (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)
If you hate you ain't like me (no no no)
I'mma gonna stay get money (ya ya ya)
I don't care if you don't like me (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)

[Verse 2: E-40]
Do we panic do we flinch? (Nope)
Come hard off the bench? (Yup)
Horrible? (Nope)
Turnt up in the Oracle? (Yup)
Can't beat Steve Kerr (Nope)
I'm a Warrior like the blurr (Yup)
Got something to say? (Nope)
Foo this is the Bay! (Yup)
Coward? (Nope)
Hustle like Iguodala? (Yup)
Do we ever play weak? (Nope)
Finesses it like David Lee (Yup)
Ain't no body better than my team (Nope)
Money like Draymond Green (Yup)
Ain't nobody finna crush our dream (Nope)
Won't stop until we get a ring (Yup)

[Hook]
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)
Errybody say Warriors (Warriors)

These haters is hating they already know
But we never going to choke (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)
And I ain't gotta sell my soul (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)
If you hate you ain't like me (no no no)
I'mma gonna stay get money (ya ya ya)
I don't care if you don't like me (no no no)
I'mma stay get money (ya ya ya)
